About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Get to know PT. Tajur Mandiri Prima closer

History.title: Company History
History.content: PT. Tajur Mandiri Prima was founded in 2000 in Bogor, West Java. We started from a small installation workshop that grew into a national scale contractor and supplier of electrical components. Our dedication to quality and occupational safety has led us to be trusted by hundreds of manufacturing companies and government institutions throughout Indonesia.

VisionMission.visionContent: To be the premier partner of choice in Indonesia in providing innovative, reliable, and internationally standardized industrial electrical system solutions.
missionPoints: Provide panel assembly and electrical installation services with the highest safety standards.
Provide a wide range of quality electrical components from global brands.
Build long-term collaborative relationships with clients through dedicating after-sales service.
Continue to develop the competency of technical HR to be adaptive to modern electrical technology.

Services.title: Integrated Electrical Services
Services.subtitle: PT. Tajur Mandiri Prima provides comprehensive electrical solutions specifically designed to meet strict standards in the industrial and manufacturing sectors.

items.title: Panel Maker (Panel Assembly)
items.description: We cater to the fabrication and assembly of various types of low to medium voltage electrical panels according to your factory's specifications and operational needs.

items.title: Cable Installation and Pulling
items.description: Comprehensive installation services from route determination, cable tray arrangement, to termination of Medium/Low Voltage cables precisely and in accordance with the latest PUIL standards.
features: Cable Tray / Ladder Arrangement and Fabrication

items.title: Maintenance & Troubleshoot
items.description: Prevent breakdowns with routine preventive maintenance programs and fast response (troubleshoot) services to minimize production downtime.

items.title: Electrical Material Supplier
items.description: In addition to services, we are also a trusted supply chain for the procurement needs of electrical spare parts from various renowned global brands for the smooth running of your production.
features: Distrubutor of Schneider, ABB, Chint Components

Metadata.title: Tajur Mandiri Prima | Electrical & Panel Contractor
Metadata.description: PT. Tajur Mandiri Prima is a trusted mechanical electrical contractor in Indonesia. Serving industrial electrical installations, LVMDP panel fabrication, capacitor bank installations, transformer maintenance, and quality component supply since 2000.
